thread.title: Cyber firms warn on suspected Russian plan to attack Ukraine

title: Cyber firms warn on suspected Russian plan to attack Ukraine
text:
Cyber firms warn on suspected Russian plan to attack Ukraine Wednesday, May 23, 2018 - 01:38
Cisco Systems has warned that hackers have infected at least 500,000 routers and storage devices in dozens of countries with highly sophisticated malicious software, possibly in preparation for another massive cyber attack on Ukraine. David Pollard reports.
